text: Albula/Alvra is a municipality of the district Albula in the canton of Graub√ºnden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2015, the municipalities of Alvaschein, Mon, Stierva, Tiefencastel, Alvaneu, Brienz/Brinzauls and Surava joined and became the new municipality of Albula/Alvra. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Municipalities in Albula Category:2015 establishments in Switzerland
title: Albula/Alvra
